content: In the third quarter, our SF&S businesses continue to be profitable and generated $7 million in adjusted net income in line with our previous guidance. Turning to the operating results, the overall company recognized an adjusted net loss of $20 million and fully diluted adjusted loss per share of $0.10, as our Forward Mortgage Origination segment continued to be pressured by current market conditions. During the third quarter Mortgage generated an adjusted net loss of $27 million, and our SF&S businesses generated adjusted net income of $7 million in line with prior guidance.
